reviewText: This DVD of Mr. Root is a masterpiece and soon to be a classic. I am a long-time Slipknot/Stone Sour fan and when I learned that my favorite guitarist had this DVD available, I knew that I had to have it within my collection. He is very, very talented and such a down to earth human being in his own right. Thank you Amazon and thank you Jim Root for this amazing video. Well worth the money.
so close and personalgreat for guitar players for the price you can't beat itcan't wait to other artist well with it

I bought this DVD for my boyfriend because he is a huge Jim Root fan. I've only seen maybe five minutes of it, but from what I did see, he talks about what any huge fan of him would want to hear; what growing up was like, early band days with Stone Sour and Slipknot etc. This is an awesome DVD because after my boyfriend watched some of it, he couldn't stop thanking me for it c:
Amazing and inspirational!
great product
I am sorry but all this was on YouTube don't waste your money
I think this is a great product. Jim is very clear when showing you how to play the songs and techniques. I'd recommend this to anyone who is a fan of Jim Root.
This is a must have for a Slipknot fan. Dude snaps you off a piece of Slipknot from his perspective about the band, Paul and himself.  And if you play guitar it's worth more than you paid. Enjoy.
If you're a fan this is a must. They did a great job on this one.

Jim Root is always good value. The first disc is more about his History with bands and where he is at now. Actually he's only in Slipknot now but the 2nd disc has a few lessons. It's definitely NOT a songbook type of DVD.
amazing isn't enough, great story and lessons worth every penny. Thanks Mr. Root!

Beware if you order to the UK, I got hit with a 13.50 customs charge for this dvd !!!,  Great dvd though with plenty of lessons by Jim although im not a good enough player to take full advantage just yet - some really good interviews all about his career too, he comes across a very funny and likable guy who really loves the guitar
Enjoyed the DVD got to know him a Little more and got a bit of life history !
Outstanding product, very in depth, although it is a bit disappointingredients to see how fast he can lay down those riffs.
Awesome DVD
Great video!
Loved it. From beginning to end. One of my favorite guitar players out there. Good feed back and inspirations.

An absolute MUST for an Jim Root fan! the "story" part of the DVD is great and the extras of all his guitars is kind of funny to watch. Also comes with a killer tab booklet to accompany the lessons and song breakdowns.

Purchased for my son as a Christmas present. He is learning to play guitar and Jim Riot is one of his favorite guitar players. He had watched it more than once and constantly talks about it. Has learned a technique or two as well.
I wish they were more in-depth lessons but he has touched on areas for me that helps me learn more to play the guitar better awesome guy awesome lesson hope they'll be more
A good tutorial on playing and a cool story about a special person.

So worth it...ive been trying to learn many of the songs on this dvd but i had troubles with just looking at tabs...but after watching the lessons i learned the song in no time..the only thing i don't like is that there isn't that much slipknot song
